Parameters.Name: EVENT-3-1-25 Event Handling REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION SET SYNCHRONIZATION POINT
Parameters.Description: This test chech that if CTT invoke SetSyncronization command DTT responce with

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: In first time PullMessagesFaultResponse is received from the DUT

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: no command unsubscribe

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time = current time in last PullMessages

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: DUT does not update termination time, T1 = terminationTime from PullMessages
Test.Description: If the DUT does not update termination time after PullMessagesRequest, then the ONVIF Client passes the test with a warning

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time = current time in last PullMessages
Test.Description: In first time PullMessagesFaultResponse is received from the DUT

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: DUT does not update termination time, T1 = terminationTime from PullMessages
Test.Description: In first time PullMessagesFaultResponse is received from the DUT If the DUT does not update termination time after PullMessagesRequest, then the ONVIF Client passes the test with a warning

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: No proprty events

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time less than current time

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time from PullMessage less than current time in Subscription

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time less than current time in PullMessages (mayby invalid value)

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: TerminationTime less then T1.

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: TerminationTime = T1.

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: empty Message in PullMessages

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: Message is not recived before timeout expired

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: termination time from PullMessage less than current time in Subscription
Test.Description: In first time PullMessagesFaultResponse is received from the DUT

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: TerminationTime less then T1.
Test.Description: In first time PullMessagesFaultResponse is received from the DUT

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: First PullMessage has empty message
